Package Ch19_Discrete_Fourier_Transform

package Ch19_Discrete_Fourier_Transform
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    DFT_2D_Demo
    This ImageJ plugin computes the 2-dimensional DFT (magnitude spectrum) from an image of arbitrary size using float or double data.
